title: Needle Points | Norman Doidge | The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast S4: E79
description:
Why so many are hesitant to get the COVID vaccines, and what we can do about it.

Read Needle Points in its entirety here:
https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/science/articles/needle-points-vaccinations-chapter-one

Needle Points,’ Tablet’s exploration into the sources and nature of vaccine hesitancy, is presented in four parts. To download a free, printer-friendly version of the complete article, click here: https://cdn.sanity.io/files/z2aip6ei/production/d9f27923a752427f6ce856f064f4d445c00d932b.pdf?dl=Needle%20Points.pdf
